item.title: Why I created the Sylvie theme?
item.description:
This is a note about the creation of the Sylvie theme.

The reason

I have been using risotto theme with custom modifications for over a year now and I love it.

But it has a major flaw: Its width. The width was only 50rem and it increases the height of the page, which is not good for reading. You will have to scroll a lot to read a long post.

item.title: A little update about me (Winter 2024)
item.description:
Cause, why not?

3 months ago, I only dared to dream of getting into my dream university - HCMUS. Now that I’m halfway through the first semester in HCMUS, I want to reflect on the experience so far.

Math is hard

Math here is freaking hard. I was and still struggling to keep up with the pace of the lectures. I’m not sure if I can make it through the semester.
